data.title: Battle of the Network Stars #1, 1976: Remastered Series
data.meta_description: 70s-TV.com Turn on the boob tube & take the time machine to relive all the glam & jiggle that was the 70s. Find your favorite 70s TV Movies & Shows on DVD.
data.text:
My Original transfers of the first 8 shows(excluding episode 2) have been copied and sold everywhere on the internet. As the years passed and I purchased new equipment, I learned more about getting the most out of the VHS to DVD process. Curious to see how much I could improve these shows, I went back to the original tapes and made a new pass at it. I was very surprised and happy with the results. I also added some beautiful menus and chapter points. What I now have is the Best and Only one of its' kind.

1st episode aired on November 13, 1976. Howard Cosell (Host) Gabriel Kaplan (ABC Team Captain) Darleen Carr (ABC Team) Lynda Carter (ABC Team) Farrah Fawcett (ABC Team) Richard Hatch (ABC Team) Robert Hegyes (ABC Team) Ron Howard (ABC Team) Hal Linden (ABC Team) Penny Marshall (ABC Team) John Schuck (ABC Team) Telly Savalas (CBS Team Captain) Adrienne Barbeau (CBS Team) Gary Burghoff (CBS Team) Pat Harrington Jr. (CBS Team) Bill Macy (CBS Team) Lee Meriwether (CBS Team) Mackenzie Phillips (CBS Team) Loretta Swit (CBS Team) Jimmie Walker (CBS Team) Robert Conrad (NBC Team Captain) Melissa Sue Anderson (NBC Team) Karen Grassle (NBC Team) Tim Matheson (NBC Team) Ben Murphy (NBC Team) Barbara Parkins (NBC Team) Joanna Pettet (NBC Team) Kevin Tighe (NBC Team) Bobby Troupe (NBC Team) Demond Wilson (NBC Team). 100 minutes. Comes with Case & Artwork.
